page.title: 19AN ADULT'S DAY
page.content: Rising with the sparrows at around 5am my mum lights the fire before going outside to assist my dad with milking the cows.Milking is finished by 6.30am.She is back in the kitchen at 7.15am to cook a breakfast of bacon,egg,tomato,fried bread and buttered toast.This is made on the electric grill and ceramatic hob.A quick wipe over ensures the hob is kept spotless.Mum makes sure that we have had a nourishing breakfast and are ready for school. Next the washing is loaded into the washing machine, and mum can then clear the table and wash-up.At 8 o'clock she goes out into the dairy to sterilize the milking utensils and bulkvat.The rest of the day is spent cleaning the house and cooking.She goes to bed at 10 o'clock.
